body.description: At 20", The Sceptre E205W-16003R monitor is your best option for both work and play. 1600 x 900 resolution delivers vivid colors and sharp images on a 20 inch screen. A 5 millisecond response time displays action sequences with the highest Degree of clarity. Enjoy HDMI, DVI, and VGA inputs to connect all video and gaming devices. Signal compatibility: digital signal Frequency - 30 – 80 kHz (horizontal)/ 60 – 75 kHz (vertical), HDMI input signal support - 1080/60P, 1080/60i, 720P, 480P, 480i, VGA input signal support - up to 1600 x 900 at the rate of 75Hz. The brightness is 250 CD/M2. Power Range: (V, A, Hz) 100 – 240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 1.1A (Max.).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adaptive Sync Adaptive Sync is a technology that closes the gap between the graphics card's and the monitor's refresh rates, eliminating image tearing and stuttering in the process. Built-in Speakers With built-in speakers, the monitor delivers office level audio for conference calls and internet workshops. Similarly, enjoy engaging audio while listening to your favorite tunes. 75Hz Refresh Rate With 75Hz refresh rate, images change faster and smoother than the standard, reducing screen tearing

Fast Response Time Fast response times reduce ghosting & blurring while transitioning pixels, always keeping the enemy & terrain precisely in focus during chaotic moments. Multiple Ports The HDMI, and VGA ports accelerate refresh rate up to 75Hz, providing the visual edge you need to defeat the competition during all of your gaming exploits. Anti-Flicker Provides a crisper picture by preventing the backlight from flickering periodically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice size if your not looking for something huge just something kind of small to use. Good quality as well has a very nice feel and display. I use it for my work and even gaming sometimes and it holds up well. Easy to set up all you have to do is attach the stand. The menu is really nice and has a lot of options to adjust the coloring and the look so it’s flexible for your needs. The speakers have a pretty good sound nothing too fancy but not bad. I was glad to see this monitor actually had speakers because for some reason I couldn’t find many that you didn’t have to buy speakers for. All in all I believe it’s worth the price, especially if it’s for your kid I think it’s definitely enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 years and going
reviews.reviewText: Surprise to say that I have only years since 2020, I purchase two that I use between office work and the side businesses. In no shape or form are these gaming monitors nor do they have the sound quality of any decent speaker, but when it came to simply fulfilling my need for multiple screens at a budget price and a clean quality display. These have worked for four years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great monitors for the price has good quality on the first monitor the only complain is 2nd monitor came in used they could’ve at least inspected it and cleaned it put a new film but screws in a newer bag but looks like they just got a return box and said let’s ship it like this very unprofessional hoping to get another one but new you can see where old owner of the monitor but their grimy hands and peeled off the hdmi sticker and 2nd monitor didn’t come with the 2nd HDMI port like the first one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came in mail quickly, well packaged. No damage and powers on. Great buy for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setup was fast! No "Settings" to deal with - just plug in & turn it on. My VGA was sensed - picture clarity & colors were perfect and display went all the way to all 4 edges. Also accepts HDMI 1&2, with clear labeling. Power adapter included. The stand connected to preinstalled metal bracket & required only 2 screws, with self-aligning holes. Correct Phillips driver supplied. Twist-on base clicks into place and very stable - super easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this little guy so much.
reviews.reviewText: For how affordable this thing is, it does exactly the job I need it to do and honestly beyond. I need my monitor at eye height because of neck strain but my keyboard at hip level for the same reason (posture) and instead of becoming a contortionist I just figured it'd be easier to get another monitor to hook up to via HDMI. My slightly more expensive -- but still on the cheaper side -- gaming monitor didn't come with internal speakers and it's been a colossal pain to hook up my external speakers to it in order to get sound, so my mission this time was to find an AFFORDABLE yet-not-crap monitor for writing that would also allow me to listen to music through my laptop. No fuss, no extra wires.I love this little guy so much. Conveniently placed buttons on the side, all the hookups you'll need, and it looks exactly like my computer monitor: no more, no less, which again is exactly what I wanted. I won't pretend that the sound isn't compressed, the speakers ARE small, so don't expect your bass to shake the roof off your house. But in terms of functionality, personality, affordability? This thing is AWESOME. Super easy on the wallet, cute, and does the job. Love it love it love it. <3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but cut my hand really bad, needed stitches!
reviews.reviewText: This is a good screen for my dual monitor setup. However, it sliced about half a centimeter deep into my palm and I needed stitches! The silver lettering on the bottom of the screen isn’t attached very well, and is extremely sharp! I was taking the monitor out of the styrofoam packaging when the letter R sliced my palm open.So if you’re going to be moving the screen around, like if it’s mounted on an arm, definitely tape over the silver SCEPTRE brand name so it doesn’t cut you too!Giving it 3 stars cuz it does work, but I wasn’t expecting my new screen to include a trip to urgent care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but good
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little monitor. Has decent refresh rate and I've had it for 3 years now.It's definitely on the smaller side and I'm finally upgrading to a larger monitor, but I'll use this as my second monitor as it's still great.The only downside would be the built in speakers kind of suck, but I almost exclusively use headphones so thats not a priority for me. Also, you can get cheap logitec speakers that work fine if you dont want to use headphones.

update november 2022; there's a dead pixel in the monitor but it's small and offf to the side so it's not too noticeable. the monitor still works fine, takes a bit longer than my other to load up. (first monitor) given how cheap i got it for too, this monitor is pretty good! i used to think it was my pc that was bad until i got this monitor. it's short though and non adjustable height so u might want a stand.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente monitor de calidad al mejor precio!!
reviews.reviewText: Definitivamente lo recomiendo, es muy delgado, tiene excelente resolución y cuesta la mitad de lo que cuesta uno de "marca reconocida". En mi caso lo utilicé para reemplazar a un viejo monitor de mi rockola. Funcionó perfectamente y ha estado funcionando 12 hr diarias durante varias semanas. Cuenta con las entradas que se mencionan en la descripción del producto. Llegó en tiempo y forma y bien empacado!

I use this for working from home. It is a decent monitor for my daily use. I wouldn’t say the picture is amazing to withhold anything spectacular in gameplay. There is only an HDMI port, no display port. I had to buy an adapter to hook up to my laptop.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad a un bajo precio.
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó que llegó en excelente estado y lo ligero que es, además que incluyó el cable HDMI.
